Package org.sat4j

Class OptimizationMode

java.lang.Object
org.sat4j.OptimizationMode
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, ILauncherMode, SolutionFoundListener
public final class OptimizationMode extends Object implements ILauncherMode
Behavior of the solver when an optimal solution is needed.
Author:
leberre

  • Constructor Details

    • OptimizationMode

      public OptimizationMode()

  • Method Details

    • instance

      public static OptimizationMode instance()
      The launcher is in optimization mode: the answer is either SAT, UPPER_BOUND, OPTIMUM_FOUND, UNSAT or UNKNOWN. Using the incomplete property, the solver returns an upper bound of the optimal solution when a time out occurs.

    • setIncomplete

      public void setIncomplete​(boolean isIncomplete)
      Description copied from interface: ILauncherMode
      Allows the launcher to specifically return an upper bound of the optimal solution in case of a time out (for maxsat competitions for instance).
      Specified by:
      setIncomplete in interface ILauncherMode
      Parameters:
      isIncomplete - true if the solver should return the best solution found so far.

    • displayResult

      public void displayResult​(ISolver solver, IProblem problem, ILogAble logger, PrintWriter out, Reader reader, long beginTime, boolean displaySolutionLine)
      Description copied from interface: ILauncherMode
      Output of the launcher when the solver stops
      Specified by:
      displayResult in interface ILauncherMode
      Parameters:
      solver - the solver that is launched by the launcher
      problem - the problem that is solved
      logger - the element that is able to log the result
      out - the printwriter to associate to the solver
      reader - the problem reader
      beginTime - the time at which the solver was launched
      displaySolutionLine - indicates whether the solution line shound be displayed or not (not recommended for large solutions)

    • solve

      public void solve​(IProblem problem, Reader reader, ILogAble logger, PrintWriter out, long beginTime)
      Description copied from interface: ILauncherMode
      Main solver call: one call for a decision problem, a loop for an optimization problem.
      Specified by:
      solve in interface ILauncherMode
      Parameters:
      problem - the problem to solve
      reader - the reader that provided the problem object
      logger - the element that is able to log the result
      out - the printwriter to associate to the solver
      beginTime - the time at which the solver starts

    • getCurrentExitCode

      public ExitCode getCurrentExitCode()
      Description copied from interface: ILauncherMode
      Allow the launcher to get the current status of the problem: SAT, UNSAT, UPPER_BOUND, etc.
      Specified by:
      getCurrentExitCode in interface ILauncherMode
      Returns:
      the status of the problem.

    • onSolutionFound

      public void onSolutionFound​(int[] solution)
      Description copied from interface: SolutionFoundListener
      Callback method called when a new solution is found. While a solution will often be a model, it might also be the case that the solution is something else (MUS, group MUS, etc).
      Specified by:
      onSolutionFound in interface SolutionFoundListener
      Parameters:
      solution - a set of Dimacs literals.

    • onSolutionFound

      public void onSolutionFound​(IVecInt solution)
      Description copied from interface: SolutionFoundListener
      Callback method called when a new solution is found. While a solution will often be a model, it might also be the case that the solution is something else (MUS, group MUS, etc).
      Specified by:
      onSolutionFound in interface SolutionFoundListener
      Parameters:
      solution - a set of Dimacs literals.

    • onUnsatTermination

      Description copied from interface: SolutionFoundListener
      Callback method called when the search is finished (either unsat problem or no more solutions found)
      Specified by:
      onUnsatTermination in interface SolutionFoundListener

      public void setExitCode​(ExitCode exitCode)
      Description copied from interface: ILauncherMode

      Specified by:
